---

## WHAT IS DOMINIONYOUTH?

**DominionYouth** is your ticket to earning real money by sharing products you love.

**How it works:**
1. You get a unique referral link
2. You share it on social media, email, WhatsApp
3. Someone buys using your link
4. You earn **20% commission** instantly

**No products to create. No inventory. Just share and earn.**

---

## QUICK START (3 STEPS)

### Step 1: Get Your Referral Link

1. Go to **Dashboard** â†’ **My Links**
2. Browse products in the marketplace
3. Click **"Get Link"** on any product
4. Copy your unique link (looks like this):

```
https://codexdominion.app/products/12345?ref=your_username
```

**That's it!** Every purchase made through your link = money in your pocket.

---

### Step 2: Share Your Link

**Where to Share:**
- âœ… Instagram (stories, posts, DMs)
- âœ… TikTok (video + link in bio)
- âœ… WhatsApp (friends, family, groups)
- âœ… Snapchat (stories, messages)
- âœ… Twitter/X (tweets, threads)
- âœ… Facebook (groups, page, profile)
- âœ… Email (if you have a list)

**Pro Tip:** Share on platforms where your audience already hangs out. Don't spam â€” add value!

---

### Step 3: Watch Your Earnings Grow

**Dashboard â†’ Earnings:**
- See total earnings (real-time updates)
- Track clicks on your links
- View sales and commissions
- Check your leaderboard rank

**When Do I Get Paid?**
- Earnings available **7 days after purchase** (to allow for refunds)
- Request payout anytime (minimum $10)
- Choose your method: PayPal, CashApp, Venmo, bank transfer
- Payouts processed within **3-5 business days**

---

## HOW MUCH CAN I EARN?

**You earn 20% of every sale.**

**Example:**
- Product price: $20
- Your commission: **$4** (20%)
- Creator earns: $16 (80%)

**Real Earnings Math:**

| Product Price | Your Earnings (20%) | After 10 Sales | After 50 Sales | After 100 Sales |
|---------------|---------------------|----------------|----------------|-----------------|
| $5 | $1 | $10 | $50 | $100 |
| $10 | $2 | $20 | $100 | $200 |
| $20 | $4 | $40 | $200 | $400 |
| $30 | $6 | $60 | $300 | $600 |
| $50 | $10 | $100 | $500 | $1,000 |

**Goal:** Make 50 sales at $20/each = **$200 in your pocket**. ğŸ”¥

---

## SHARING TIPS (HOW TO GET MORE CLICKS & SALES)

### 1. Know Your Audience
- **Instagram:** Visual products (coloring books, printables)
- **TikTok:** Trending topics, challenges, memes
- **WhatsApp:** Personal connections, family, friends
- **Facebook Groups:** Niche communities (homeschool, Christian moms, wedding planning)

### 2. Create Hype
- Don't just drop a link â€” tell a story
- "I just found this dope [product] and it's only $X!"
- Use emojis, energy, and personality
- Make people curious

### 3. Show Value
- Explain what the product does
- Share a preview (if allowed)
- Testimonials work (if you've used it or know someone who has)

### 4. Use Multiple Platforms
- Don't rely on one platform
- Cross-post (Instagram â†’ TikTok â†’ WhatsApp)
- The more places you share, the more sales you'll get

### 5. Engage, Don't Spam
- Reply to comments and DMs
- Answer questions about the product
- Build trust (people buy from people they trust)

---

## LEADERBOARD (CLIMB THE RANKS)

The **DominionYouth Leaderboard** shows top earners every week.

**Rankings:**
- #1-10: **Top 10** badge ğŸ†
- #1 creator earnings: **Top Creator** badge ğŸ¨
- #1 referrer earnings: **Top Referrer** badge ğŸ“¢
- $1,000+ total earnings: **High Roller** badge ğŸ’°
- First sale ever: **First Sale** badge â­

**Why it matters:**
- Bragging rights (show off your rank)
- Recognition (we spotlight top earners on social media)
- Prizes (weekly/monthly challenges with cash bonuses)
- Motivation (see where you stand, push to climb)

**Pro Tip:** The leaderboard resets every week. Fresh start every Monday!

## FAQ (FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS)

### How do I know if someone used my link?
Check **Dashboard â†’ Earnings** â†’ **Clicks & Sales**. You'll see every click and purchase made through your link.

### What if I share a product and the creator changes the price?
Your commission is always **20% of the sale price** at the time of purchase. If the price goes up, you earn more. If it goes down, you earn less.

### Can I share multiple products?
Yes! Share as many as you want. The more you share, the more you earn.

### Can I share my own products (if I'm also a creator)?
No. You can't earn referral commissions on your own products. But you can share other creators' products and earn commissions on those.

### What if someone clicks my link but doesn't buy immediately?
Your link is tracked for **30 days**. If they come back within 30 days and buy, you still get credit.

### How do I get paid?
Request a payout anytime (minimum $10) via **Dashboard â†’ Payouts**. Choose PayPal, CashApp, Venmo, or bank transfer. Payouts take 3-5 business days.

### What if a buyer requests a refund?
If a refund is approved, the commission is reversed. Your earnings will be adjusted accordingly.

### Can I track my leaderboard rank in real-time?
Yes! The leaderboard updates every **5 minutes**. Check **Dashboard â†’ Leaderboard** to see your current rank.

### What happens if I rank up?
You'll get a **rank-up animation** ğŸ‰ + a notification. Keep climbing!

### Can I lose badges?
Some badges are permanent (**First Sale**, **High Roller** if you've hit $1,000+ lifetime). Others reset weekly (**Top 10**, **Top Creator**, **Top Referrer**).

---

## EARNING STRATEGIES (PRO TIPS)

### 1. Pick Products You Believe In
- Don't just share random stuff
- Share products you've used or would actually buy
- Authenticity = trust = sales

### 2. Target Niche Audiences
- **Homeschool moms:** Share homeschool activity books
- **Caribbean diaspora:** Share cultural products (Caribbean recipes, coloring books, etc.)
- **Christian community:** Share faith-based eBooks, devotionals

### 3. Bundle Your Shares
- Don't spam one product 10 times a day
- Share different products to different audiences
- Variety keeps your feed fresh

### 4. Engage with Your Audience
- Reply to comments and DMs
- Answer questions about products
- Build relationships (people buy from people they trust)

### 5. Use Trends
- TikTok: Hop on trending sounds and challenges
- Instagram: Use trending reels formats
- Make your shares feel native to the platform

### 6. Track What Works
- Check which products get the most clicks
- Double down on what converts
- Stop sharing products that don't perform
